Name: VR Dream Girl
About the game: As the cost of 'dating' in the real world becomes more and more expensive, and some groups of humans are also socially intimidated, virtual partners are a great option. In the VR world people find their own 'Dream Girl' and together they can play all sorts of fun 'mini-games' to begin their first emotional experience. Game features.
